page.title: 07Living in Sherford in 1985.
page.content: I enjoy living in Sherford. It is a nice place to live because there are not many cars so we can ride our bikes without worrying. There are lots of fields we aren't allowed to go in because they have corn in them. Most people like living in Sherford because it is nice and quiet, especially the elderly people. Sherford has a church, village hall, an old school house, an old chapel, council houses, new houses and bungalows, old cottages and farms. Our house is an old cottage called Feys Cottage. It has three bedrooms,a bathroom, kitchen, hall, sittingroom and lounge. I have a bedroom with my brother. My dad is a farm worker. My mum stays at home all day. I have three brothers and a pet rabbit named Flop.
